universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler

Interface WebFragmentAnnotationHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler, AnnotationHandler, FragmentAnnotationHandler

    public interface WebFragmentAnnotationHandler
extends ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler
    An ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler extended interface for annotation handlers from the Fragments library that are used to handle processing of annotations attached to classes derived from WebFragment class provided by this library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    WebFragment

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler.FragmentAnnotationHandler

        NO_RES

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getWebContent(String defaultContent)
      Returns the web content string obtained from @WebContent annotation (if presented) from WebContent.value().
      int getWebContentResId(int defaultResId)
      Returns the web content string resource id obtained from @WebContent annotation (if presented) from WebContent.valueRes().

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler.ActionBarFragmentAnnotationHandler

        configureActionBar, getOptionsMenuFlags, getOptionsMenuResource, handleCreateActionMode, hasOptionsMenu, shouldClearOptionsMenu

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler.FragmentAnnotationHandler

      • Methods inherited from interface universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.handler.AnnotationHandler

    • Method Detail

      • getWebContentResId

        @StringRes
int getWebContentResId(@StringRes
                                   int defaultResId)
        Returns the web content string resource id obtained from @WebContent annotation (if presented) from WebContent.valueRes().
        Parameters:
        defaultResId - Default content resource id to be returned if there is no annotation presented or resource id is not specified.
        Returns:
        Via annotation specified web content resource id or defaultResId.

      • getWebContent

        @Nullable
String getWebContent(@Nullable
                                String defaultContent)
        Returns the web content string obtained from @WebContent annotation (if presented) from WebContent.value().
        Parameters:
        defaultContent - Default content to be returned if there is no annotation presented or content is not specified.
        Returns:
        Via annotation specified web content or defaultContent.
